Reviews.Title: “Quiet, comfortable hotel close to the Vatican”
Reviews.Author: AgTaistealGoMinic
Reviews.Content: close vatican quiet street ensuring nights sleep view roof terrace breakfast tasty desk staff friendly helpful oldfashioned bit dark clean comfortable sleep quality price location id stay

Reviews.Title: “Good value and close to the sights”
Reviews.Author: Gus1970
Reviews.Content: location short walk vatican city walked sites dont energy metro line runs close main shopping street corner restaurants located clean comfortable beds stayed twin little bit pokey probable expect price location issue trying regulate temperature breakfast standard italy sliced meats cheeses fresh juice fruit toast eggs etc staff willing assist happy friendly overall definitely stay rooftop terrace chill quiet drink

Reviews.Title: “A Quiet Location in Rome!”
Reviews.Author: marmaduke58
Reviews.Content: hotel located quiet rome vatican city roof terrace view dome st peters comfortable breakfast found desk staff helful shame stop staying coach runs 3 airport piazza cavour five minutes walk hotel costs 8 euro person includes luggage coach web site restaurant near hotel hotel front entrance walk blocks via visconti al restaurant

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel. would stay there again”
Reviews.Author: stonfix
Reviews.Content: hotel located nice near santangelo vatican close main attractions fun rome walking subway 5 blocks there´s action i´d populated noisy center city confortable clean bathroom wi fi breakfast decent nice value money

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Arcangelo is a mainstay of any visit to Rome”
Reviews.Author: km0722
Reviews.Content: hotel favorite mine 1991 husband found stayed honeymoon returned time rome brought friends family service quality enjoy breakfast solarium solarium favorite amenity breakfast enjoy view glass wine bite bread cheese relax evening bed recommend rome

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, loved our stay”
Reviews.Author: dleng
Reviews.Content: spent 7 nights hotel absolutely loved location easy walking distance vatican sights continental breakfast adequate day liked meat tray fresh pastries morning coffee staff main desk personnel pleasant helpful question enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Good value - great hotel”
Reviews.Author: -Honey-32123
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights july hotel quiet street nice roof top garden close vatican city 5 minute walk pros quiet breakfast pastries eggs bread cereal juice coffee yoghurt etc friendly staff close lots shops restaurants clean cons walk major attractions colosseum trevi fountain didnt bother 30 minutes walk amazing bathroom extremely shower european standards bed bit saint peters favourite rome hotel allowed vatican 2 3 hour lines started form

Reviews.Title: “a big disappointment”
Reviews.Author: umteacher
Reviews.Content: booked hotel son wife based reviews site location greatclose vatican major double theyd booked available checkin single hotel offer night hotel refused pay taxi fare 15 euros airconditioning portable air conditioner sounds except whenever power theyd call main desk switch breaker temperature mid 30s celcius uncomfortable nights elevator day hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Arcangelo
HotelInfo.Address: Via Boezio 15, 00192 Rome, Italy
